  • Method Details

    • handleHelloClient

      public void handleHelloClient​(ClientModel clientmodel, HelloClientBody helloClientBody)
      When a client receives HelloClient from the server, the variable WaitingForServer is changed to false. and now the client can send messages to the server.
      Parameters:
      clientmodel - The ClientModel
      helloClientBody - The message body of the JSON message

    • handleWelcome

      public void handleWelcome​(ClientModel clientmodel, WelcomeBody welcomeBody)
      When the Client receives Welcome from the Server, the method creates a playerID for him.
      Parameters:
      clientmodel - The ClientModel
      welcomeBody - The message body of the JSON message

    • handleError

      public void handleError​(ClientModel clientmodel, ErrorBody errorBody)
      When an Error happens, it is sent after that to the player.
      Parameters:
      clientmodel - The ClientModel
      errorBody - The message body of the JSON message

    • handleReceivedChat

      public void handleReceivedChat​(ClientModel clientModel, ReceivedChatBody receivedChatBody)
      When a client receives a chat message, it triggers the method receiveMessage in clientModel, so the message can be shown.
      Parameters:
      clientModel - The ClientModel
      receivedChatBody - The message body of the JSON message

    • handleGameStarted

      public void handleGameStarted​(ClientModel clientModel, GameStartedBody gameStartedBody)
      When a Game is started, all the players get 5 energy cubes. A method from ClientGameModel is called to create the Map Objects, then it sets the Game to On.
      Parameters:
      clientModel - The ClientModel
      gameStartedBody - The message body of the JSON message
